swistrackcomponent.name: Calibration with a linear model
swistrackcomponent.description: This component applies a linear transformation to the particles to transform their pixel coordinates to a world coordinates. Basically, a camera rectangle is mapped onto a tetragon.

configuration.title: Rectangle on the camera image

parameter.name: CameraTopLeft
parameter.label: Top left corner of the rectangle (pixels)

parameter.name: CameraBottomRight
parameter.label: Bottom right corner of the rectangle (pixels)

configuration.title: World coordinates
configuration.label: The corners of the camera rectangle correspond to the following world coordinates:

parameter.name: WorldTopLeft
parameter.label: Top left corner of the world

parameter.name: WorldTopRight
parameter.label: Top right corner of the world

parameter.name: WorldBottomLeft
parameter.label: Bottom left corner of the world

parameter.name: WorldBottomRight
parameter.label: Bottom right corner of the world
